question: The chart shows the number of drought days recorded each year. Which statement is correct according to the chart data?

options.A: 2011-12 has nearly four times as many days as 2010-11, as the bar size suggests.
options.B: 2007-08 is the highest among all years shown.
options.C: 2011-12 has nearly four times as many days as 2006-07.

explanation: Bars are dual-encoded (height + width/color), which can make later years look disproportionately larger. The correct inference from the numbers is that 2011-12 has nearly four times as many days as 2006-07.
